useCase.name: Data Security and Compliance Report Generation

preconditions.precondition: The Funder requests specific project data security details.

successEndConditions.condition: The Report Generator delivers the formatted security assessment report to the Funder.

useCase.trigger: Funder requests security details for a specific project.

mainSequence.step: Funder requests security details for a specific project.
DMPTool forwards the request to SecurityAssessmentModule.
SecurityAssessmentModule assesses security measures and standards.
SecurityAssessmentModule fetches relevant project data security protocols from ProjectData.
ProjectData returns the security protocols to SecurityAssessmentModule.
SecurityAssessmentModule verifies compliance with legal standards through ComplianceDatabase.
ComplianceDatabase confirms compliance status and returns it to SecurityAssessmentModule.
ReportGenerator compiles the security assessment report.
ReportGenerator generates and formats the report.
DMPTool provides the data security and compliance report to the Funder.
